channel.title: Mhm why do people hate ham sooo much mhm?
channel.description:
well i really dont kno why people are like.. I H8 HAM :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
i really dont get it.. what makes people so mad about it? i have it and i love it. lag free. and u can always get on a server if u forgot ip..
so what makes people hate ham so much. is it that they just dont get it? or how to use it?
